name: HazeBreak
subtitle: A curated collection of awesome apps 🎮

apps.name: Minecraft
apps.versionDescription: The latest version of Minecraft Bedrock Edition (PE) is 1.21.81! 🌟 This update introduces exciting new features, including the 'Spring Arrives' theme with environmental effects like falling leaves 🍃, grass in deserts 🌵, and other immersive details. Cartographer villagers now offer new maps to locate villages and special points of interest 🗺️, while the wandering trader has refreshed their catalog 🎪. Magnetite can now be crafted with iron ⚙️.
apps.localizedDescription: Explore infinite worlds in Minecraft PE! Build, mine, battle mobs, and team up with friends in this blocky sandbox adventure. 🌍⛏️🐉
